ShadowPierce.Name: ShadowPierce
ShadowPierce.Narrative: unleashes a dark energy spear, piercing through the air.

InfernoBlast.Name: InfernoBlast
InfernoBlast.Narrative: conjures a massive fireball, engulfing the target in flames.

ArcaneSurge.Name: ArcaneSurge
ArcaneSurge.Narrative: summons a surge of arcane energy, shocking the enemy.

ToxicSpit.Name: ToxicSpit
ToxicSpit.Narrative: spews a noxious toxin at the opponent.

EtherealChain.Name: EtherealChain
EtherealChain.Narrative: casts phantom chains to ensnare the target.

CrystalShard.Name: CrystalShard
CrystalShard.Narrative: hurls a shard of ice, freezing the target upon impact.

SearingRay.Name: SearingRay
SearingRay.Narrative: emits a blinding ray of light, searing everything in its path.

GaleForce.Name: GaleForce
GaleForce.Narrative: summons a violent gust of wind, disarming the enemy.
